facts.fact: Zapier integrates with over 3,000 apps, allowing users to automate workflows without coding.
Zapier is used by over 4 million users worldwide to streamline their operations.
Zapier offers a free plan that allows users to create simple automations.
Zapier's automation platform is designed to help SMBs save time and reduce manual tasks.

risks: Potential market saturation with similar automation tools.
Changing regulations in the EU and UK regarding data privacy may impact operations.
Dependence on third-party app integrations may lead to service disruptions.
